snippet: The president has agreed to be a guest on "The Daily Show" with Jon Stewart next Thursday - two days after the second debate between Mr. Obama and his G.O.P. rival, Mitt Romney.
abstract: The president has agreed to be a guest on "The Daily Show" with Jon Stewart next Thursday - two days after the second debate between Mr. Obama and his G.O.P. rival, Mitt Romney.

headline.main: Obama to Appear on 'Daily Show' Next Week
